Name: ASTRO ACE
About the game: ASTRO ACE is a retro-style addictive arcade space shooter. From the distant universe, an evil alien fleet is invading the solar system. You will have to ride a powerful spaceship and fight against endless waves of enemies. • You have to battle an endless wave of enemies in a universe surrounded by radiation walls. You can use the boost, brake, and left and right turns to avoid attacking enemies or aim behind them. • There are more than 10 types of weapons: cannon, laser, plasma, and missile, etc. Eliminate enemies with your own way. Don't forget to replenish your ammo and energy to destroy more enemy ships and survive longer. • When you shoot down 5 Elite ships of the enemy, you can get powerful Wingman support for 15 seconds. • Make your ship more powerful through various power-ups and prepare for extreme boss battles. • Level up to use the weapon you want from the start or unlock new ships and equipment for your support. • Get a higher score than the other aces and rank at the top of the leaderboard. • Endless waves of a variety of enemies. • Challenging boss stage battles. • 10 Playable spaceships. • 14 unique primary weapons. • 7 powerful secondary weapons. • 3 levels power-ups of range, damage, etc. • Unlockable ships, paint jobs, and support equipment. • Steam leaderboards, Steam cloud support, and Achievements. • Keyboard, Gamepad Support.
